name: apis/telegram/bot/Webhook update listener
description: Sets up an listener for Telegram bot webhook updates.

6d1a73a2-0137-48ed-9664-9187a349e2da.name: ok
6d1a73a2-0137-48ed-9664-9187a349e2da.description:
Receives a signal indicating the success of processing the webhook request.

Truthy indicates success, falsy indicates failure.

b51aea51-092d-4e26-9988-c4f4a49ca794.type:
{
  "serverId": string,
  "port": number,
  "route": string,
  optional "host": string,
  optional "timeout": number
}
b51aea51-092d-4e26-9988-c4f4a49ca794.name: params
b51aea51-092d-4e26-9988-c4f4a49ca794.description: Receives static parameters for the webhook endpoint.

92a129a0-11e0-4d8f-9999-096f66dcb04a.name: update
92a129a0-11e0-4d8f-9999-096f66dcb04a.description: Sends the update received by the webhook.

cbcc67ea-adc3-4bef-8fb7-196f49b422dc.type:
{
  "baseUrl": string,
  "body": any,
  "cookies": any,
  "hostname": string,
  "headers": {string: string},
  "ip": string,
  "ips": string[],
  "method": "POST",
  "originalUrl": string,
  "params": {string: string},
  "path": string,
  "protocol": (
    "http"
    or "https"
  ),
  "query": {string: any},
  "route": string,
  "secure": boolean,
  "signedCookies": any,
  "stale": boolean,
  "subdomains": string[],
  "xhr": boolean
}
cbcc67ea-adc3-4bef-8fb7-196f49b422dc.name: request
